item.title: Clip of Stone Pelting on Ganesh Idol in Karnataka Viral With False Communal Spin
item.description:
<![CDATA[A video showing two people standing on the roof of a building, pelting stones at a Ganesh immersion procession passing by, is being widely shared on social media.
The claim: A section of social media users have claimed that it shows people from the Muslim community pelting stones at the Hindu festival procession in Hassan, Karnataka....]]>
item.author: Aishwarya Varma
